responses: This webpage can be used to assess your current financial situation, help you prepare for retirement and enrich your pre-retirement phase, the Prime Time. This webpage offers two options: You can either download an Excel spreadsheet to complete on your local computer or use the web-based calculators to fill in your information directly on this webpage.

patterns: Where do I find the learninghub?
Where do I find Learning Hub
responses: You can find the LearningHub at the bottom of the homepage. You can also follow this link: {link to learninghub}

The Learning Hub offers a variety of resources and tools to help you with your financial planning and retirement preparation. It includes articles, videos, and interactive tools to help you understand different concepts.

patterns: What is the self assessment about?
whats the use of self assessment
Do i have to do self assessment
responses: The Self-Assessment is about identifying your financial strenghts and whether you are prepared for your future retirement or not. This assessment is optional and you can take it multiple times.

patterns: Where do i find the self assessment?
responses: You can find the Self-Assessment tool in the form of a button at the top of the page called 'Self-Assessment'. You can also follow this link: {link to self assessment}.
Please tell me what you are looking for specifically.

Bec Wilson is owner and creator of the Epic Retirement Institute that help people between the age 47 and 65 plan smarter for retirement. She is an expert in financial planning and retirement preparation. Find out more about her at {link to bec wilson website}.

patterns: what is the use of prime time
do i have to do prime time
why do i have prime time
responses: The Prime Time is a concept developed by Bec Wilson to help individuals between the ages of 47 and 65 focus on their retirement planning. It emphasizes the importance of taking action during this critical period to ensure a secure financial future. Find out more about the Prime Time at {link to prime time}.

Superannuation is a way of saving for retirement in Australia, where your employer contributes money to a fund on your behalf. This fund grows over time and helps provide income when you retire. Learn more at {link to superannuation}.

Retirement drawdown refers to the process of withdrawing funds from your retirement savings to provide income during retirement. Itâ€™s important to plan your drawdown strategy to ensure your savings last. Find out more at {link to retirement drawdown}.

patterns: how do I calculate net worth
responses: Net worth is the total value of your assets minus your liabilities. It gives you a snapshot of your financial position. You can calculate it using our tools or learn more at {link to net worth}.

Super growth refers to the increase in value of your superannuation fund over time, due to contributions and investment returns. Learn more about maximizing your super growth at {link to super growth}.

patterns: What is the Prime Time book?
tell me about the Prime Time book
who wrote the Prime Time book
who is the author of the prime time book
responses: The Prime Time book is written by Bec Wilson and provides guidance on retirement planning for people aged 47 to 65. It covers strategies and tips for making the most of your Prime Time years. Find out more or get your copy at {link to primetime book}.

patterns: Do i have to read the primetime book
what is the use of prime time book
do i have to read primetime book
do i have to read book to complete the calculators
do i have to read book to complete the spreadsheet
do i have to read book to complete the self assessment
why do i have to read the prime time book
responses: The Prime Time book offers valuable insights and strategies for making the most of your Prime Time years. It is preferred that you have read or have at least understand the concepts of the book. However, you do not have to read the whole book to use the calculators or other tools. You can still use our tools to enhance your retirement planning! If you have not already received the book, get your copy at {bec wilson website link to primetime book}.

patterns: How do I upload excel spreadsheet?
wher do i find upload excel
how do i upload the excel spreadsheet
where can i upload the excel spreadsheet
how do i start uploading the excel spreadsheet

how do i use the excel spreadsheet
how do i find the upload box
responses:
Here are the steps for uploading the excel spreadsheet:
1. Go to the Dashboards page: {link to dashboards page}
2. Find the upload box at the center top of the page and click the button 'Choose file' next to the empty field.
3. Find your completed Excel spreadsheet on your local computer
4. Click 'Upload spreadsheet'

 The dashboards will automatically fill themselves based on the values in the spreadsheet

responses: To get started, you can either upload your completed Excel spreadsheet or use the web-based calculators. Choose the option that works best for you! We recommend to do the Self-Assessment first.

patterns: how do I find web calculators
tell me where is the calculator
how do I use the web calculators
how do I start the web calculators
how do I access the web calculators
how do i start web calculators
responses:
At the near top of the homepage, you can find two options to either download and upload the spreadsheet or do the web-based calculators. By clicking on the button 'Use Web Calculators', you will see 13 calculators listed in an overview page.
 Click the start button or click on any calculator you want to start with. Then, on the dashboards page, click the button 'Apply Web Calculators'. This will automatically fill the dashboards based on the values entered in the calculators

patterns: Are the calculators better than excel?
responses: Both options offer distinct advantages over each other. For example, the spreadsheet offers offline functionality, while the web-based calculators are more accessible and user-friendly.

patterns: what can I do when im sad?
responses: I am sorry to hear that you are feeling that way. Life is hard sometimes, but remember that you are not alone. If you need someone to talk to, consider reaching out to a trusted friend, family member, or a mental health professional.

patterns: I am scared of the future
what can I do when im scared?
i am feeling nervous about the future
responses: It's normal to feel scared or anxious about the future, especially when it is about your financial situation. This is why we developed this self-help tool. We provide a range of resources to help you get a better understanding of your future and prepare for your financial journey approaching retirement. If you need tailored support, Bec Wilson is here to help and assist you. However, if you feel overwhelmed in general, consider talking to someone who can help you process these feelings, like a mental health professional.
